Title: Prohibits the use of atrazine, metalaxyl or the neonicotinoids class of chemicals
Summary: Prohibits the use of atrazine, metalaxyl or the neonicotinoids class of chemicals.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the use of the chemicals atrazine, metalaxyl and the neonicotinoids class of chemicals
